ygData.msgSnippet: not bad at all 8)  while you re at it you can have one for screetch/evac somewhat like: Everybody be cool this is a evac, any of you ***** move and i ll
ygData.messageBody:
not bad at all 8) while you're at it you can have one for screetch/evac
somewhat like:

Everybody be cool this is a evac, any of you ***** move and i'll screetch
every last one of ya.

though in an evac, people will probably not see it

-Minkin
Sol Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Gordon Hughes [mailto:ghughes@...]
Sent: Thursday, July 27, 2000 3:48 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] coolest emotes


I've got this one set up for when I stop off at a bank on a corpse run...

Apologies in advance for the implied swearing, but in context it's raised a
few laughs.

While standing in front of the banker in Kelethin (modified for wherever)...

/em says "Hand me my drum." Banker Willaen replies "Which one is it?"
/say It's the one with 'Bard Motherf*cker' written on it.

Kyrisha
